t: Requirements and tips for enrolling a brand in Amazon Brand Registry - Sell on Amazon
s: June 4, 2024 - To enroll a brand in Brand Registry, your brand must have an active registered trademark or a pending trademark registration. That trademark must be a text-based mark (word mark) or an image-based mark with words, letters, or numbers (design mark) from approved government intellectual property (IP) offices. ... Securing IP rights can be complex and costly, but it’s a necessary step to protect your name...
